statements: DELETE FROM practice_plans WHERE created_at < '2022-01-01' AND plan_id IN (SELECT plan_id FROM practice_plans WHERE plan_description LIKE '%advanced%');
DELETE FROM practice_sessions WHERE coach_name = 'John Smith';

DELETE FROM practice_goals
WHERE goal_id = 1 AND session_id = 3;
DELETE FROM practice_sessions WHERE coach_name = 'John Doe' OR duration_hours > 2;
DELETE FROM goals WHERE completed = TRUE;
DELETE FROM goals WHERE player_id = 100 AND target_date <= '2022-01-31';
DELETE FROM goals WHERE player_id = 'def78933-e2f7-4fa7-830d-6ec5fb7a59b5' AND description LIKE '%improve%' LIMIT 1;
DELETE FROM goals WHERE goal_description = 'Improve passing skills';
